summary: As part of a sorority ritual, pledges and their male companions steal a trophy from a bowling alley; unbeknownst to them, it contains a devilish imp who makes their lives a living Hell.
cast: Andras Jones|Linnea Quigley|Robin Stille|Hal Havins|John Stuart Wildman|Brinke Stevens|Michelle Bauer|Kathi O'Brecht|Carla B.|George 'Buck' Flower|Michael Sonye
title: Chicas de fraternidad en la bolera
